title.rendered: Marland, a realistc  nordic island in the summer

excerpt.rendered:
Marland is a medium-sized 4k Summer Survival Friendly Terrain for Java made by McMeddon. It contains sunny beaches infront of the hard cold cliffs of Marland, huge mountains and wide plains. Enjoy the wide grass fields of the center and travel alongside the coast on rocky sandy beaches.

This map was as a follow-up map to Rocky Forest, summer map. The key idea was to have huge and steep cliffs with wide open build areas, a huge bay to build in and 2 mountain ranges that separate the island comparable with island and Greenland areas, so it’s definitely a Nordic map for sure. Open fields and dense forest should make building easy and enjoyable. Detailed texturing and the sheer impressiveness is making this map an absolute eyecandy.
